barometer_absorbed_humidity.name: Barometer has Absorbed Humidity
solutions: Remove the barometer. Let it dry inside a sealed bag with silica gel packs for at least 24 hours before reinstalling.
If problem persists, seek to replace barometer.

camera_fpv_gimbal_stuck.name: FPV Camera Gimbal Stuck
solutions: Clean the FPV camera gimbal and make sure it can move freely.

radar_fwd_bearing_damaged.name: Forward Radar Bearing is Damaged
solutions: If replacement of the forward radar's bearing is not available, replace entire radar module.

radar_rear_bearing_damaged.name: Rear Radar Bearing is Damaged
solutions: If replacement of the rear radar's bearing is not available, replace entire radar module.

radar_rear_incorrectly_installed_or_misa.name: Rear Radar Incorrectly Installed or Misaligned
solutions: Ensure the rear radar is correctly installed and aligned.
